prompts: Create a tiny bird Pokemon with bright green feathers and a cheerful expression.
Imagine a psychic-type Pokemon that looks like a small, playful avian creature.
Generate a cute Pokemon that can blend into its forest habitat with vibrant colors.
Show me a whimsical bird Pokemon that has an eye-catching yellow beak and red accents.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of nature with a blend of green and yellow hues.
Give me a flying-type Pokemon that has unique patterns on its wings and a friendly demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that represents joy and curiosity, with a charming and colorful appearance.
